headline: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. Declares Dividends on Preferred Stock
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., August 04, 2025--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) announced that its board of directors has declared the following dividends on its preferred stock payable on October 6, 2025, to preferred shareholders of record at the close of business on September 19, 2025:
